data.name: Black Trail VR
data.detailed_description:
Discord Community


About the Game

The Old West is coming to life with this VR exclusive action/shooter game! Black Trail will put you in the middle of pure good old western action with an intense war story.

It’s the gold rush era. Native people attacked the Snake Canyon mine just a few days after white men discovered ancient artifacts. Jack, an old bounty hunter, and White Eagle, a well-respected warrior are both going after the same artifacts for different reasons.

Switch between Jack and White Eagle throughout the chapters, use unique, historic weapons, fight hundreds of men in a wide old west world and change the fate of the war.



EVER CHANGING GAMEPLAY
Black Trail offers a non-repetitive gaming experience thanks to its distinctive chapters. In every chapter, you will switch between Jack and White Eagle, equip a new set of weapons and fight against a different enemy while discovering a new environment.



UNIQUE WEAPON-ITEM COMBINATIONS
In every chapter of Black Trail, you will be given a new weapon-item combination and a new task. Every weapon is chosen for its distinct interaction style which will transform every chapter into a new and unique fighting experience. You will master your new weapon.



A DUAL-SIDED STORY WITH NARRATION
There are always two sides to every story. Black Trail’s story is told via fully narrated and animated shorts in-between chapters from both Jack’s and White Eagle’s perspectives. Jack is an old, careless bounty hunter and White Eagle is a passionate, vengeful warband leader. They are trying to capture newly discovered ancient artifacts as they fight against each other, time, and hundreds of enemies.



REALISTIC MECHANICS
Lever your rifle, throw axes, shield from incoming bullets, reload your six-shooter, draw your bow, turn the hand crank of a Gatling gun… Weapons and items are created as close to real-life mechanics as possible with a smooth VR experience in mind.



MULTIPLE MOVEMENT OPTIONS
Discovering wide old-west environments while being able to fight against hundreds of enemies requires natural-feeling mobility in Virtual Reality. In Black Trail, you are not limited to one type of locomotion; you will be able to walk and teleport anytime you want. Experience lifelike mobility as you fight, take cover, or search for ammo while minimizing the effects of motion sickness.



OLD-WEST INSPIRED ENVIRONMENTS & IMMERSIVE GRAPHICS
Clear an occupied western town, fight through a moving military train, walk into the depths of a gold mine… Delicately designed, old-west-inspired environments, immersive graphics, and the power of virtual reality will make you a part of the era.

data.short_description: Black Trail is a VR shooter set in an epic war in the old west. Play as a bounty hunter and a native warrior, follow their interwoven stories, use historic weapons, explore, escape, infiltrate, loot, adapt, survive and fight as you chase newly discovered artifacts to change the fate of war.
